definitions.definition: To cause (a person , their body , etc.) to look awkward and stiff , like a scarecrow (noun sense 1) .

subdefinitions.definition: To splay (one's arms ) away from the body, like the arms of a scarecrow.

definitions.definition: To frighten or terrify (someone or something), as if using a scarecrow.
To spoil the appearance of (something, such as the landscape or a view ), as scarecrows may be regarded as doing.

main_definition: To cause (a person , their body , etc.) to look awkward and stiff , like a scarecrow (noun sense 1) .
secondary_definitions: To frighten or terrify (someone or something), as if using a scarecrow.
( archaic ) To spoil the appearance of (something, such as the landscape or a view ), as scarecrows may be regarded as doing.
